options: Kugendera mugice icyo aricyo cyose kirimo ibinyabiziga bike
Kugendera kugice cy'ibumoso keretse ushaka gusohokera iburyo
Kugendera mu gice cy'iburyo bw'umuhanda keretse ushaka kunyuranaho
Ntagutwarira mu ruhande rw'iburyo bw'umuhanda kuko hagenewe imodoka  ziremereye n'imodoka nini zitwara abantu.
question: Igihe umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga atwaye mu muhanda urombereje w'ibice byinshi  agomba kugendera mu kihe gice cy'umuhanda ?
Iyo kuyobya umuhanda ari ngombwa bigaragazwa kuva aho uhera no kuburebure  bwawo n'icyapa gifite ubuso bw'amabara akurikira:

options: Reka umunyamaguru umwe atambuke ubone umwanya wogutambuka
question: Aha ni iki umuyobozi w' ikinyabiziga yakora mugihe ashaka kujya iburyo?
Iyo nta mategeko awugabanya by'umwihariko, umuvuduko ntarengwa ku modoka  zikoreshwa nk'amavatiri y'ifasi cyangwa amatagisi zifite uburemere bwemewe  butarenga kilogarama 3500 ni:

options: a na c ni byo bisubizo by'ukuri
question: Umuyobozi ubonye ko hari undi umukurikiye ashaka kumunyuraho agomba  kubahiriza ibi bikurikira
Iyo tumuritswe n'amatara y'urugendo y'i kinyabiziga utugarurarumuri tugomba  n'ijoro, igihe ijuru rikeye kubonwa n'umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga kiri mu ntera  ikurikira:

options: Egera kunkombe y'iburyo bw'umuhanda nibinashoboka ugabanye umuvuduko
humisha ikinyabiziga giturutse mu kindi cyerekezo ucana amatara maremare.
Canira amatara ikinyabiziga kiva mukindi cyerekezo
Ongera umuvuduko kugira ngo usohoke mururwo rumuri vuba bishoboka
question: N'iki umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga yakora aramutse ahumishijwe n'urumuri rw'amatara  yikinyabiziga giturutse mu kindi cyerekezo?
Uburemere ntarengwa bwemewe ntibushobora kurenga cy'uburemere  bw'ikinyabiziga gikurura nubw'umuyobozi kuri romoruki zikurikira :
Ni ryari ikinyabiziga gishobora kugenda mu muhanda moteri itaka cyangwa vitesi  idakora:

Ahari hejuru cyane y'ubuso bumurika h'amatara ndanga mbere na ndanga nyuma,  ntihashobora kuba aharenze metero 1 na santimetero 90 hejuru y'ubutaka, iyo  ikinyabiziga kidapakiye ku byerekeye utugarurarumuri ubwo buhagarike ntibushobora  kurenga

options: Itonde witegereze ni biba ngongwa ubaburire unitegura kuba wahagarara.
Ihute urenge aho abo bana bari
question: N'iyihe myifatire myiza wagira ugeze aho abana bari hafi y'inzira nyabagendwa?

options: A na B ni ibisubizo by'ukuri
question: Amahoni y'ibinyabiziga bigendeshwa na moteri agomba kohereza ijwi ry'injyana imwe  rikomeza kandi ridacengera amatwi ariko ibinyabiziga bikurikira bishobora kugira  ihoni ridasanzwe ridahuye n'ibivuzwe haruguru:

options: Ishusho y'uruziga mw'ibara ritukura ubuso bwera n'ikirango cy'umukara
Ishusho ya mpandeshatu mw'ibara ritukura ubuso bwera n'ikirango cy'umukara
Ishusho ya mpandeshatu mw'ibara ritukura ubuso bw'ubururu n'ikirango  cy'umukara
Ishusho y'uruziga mw'ibara ritukura ubuso bw'ubururu n'ikirango cy'umukara
question: Icyapa kimenyesha kugendera mu muhanda ubisikanirwamo gifite:
Iyo nta mategeko awugabanya by'umwihariko, umuvuduko ntarengwa ku modoka  zitwara abagenzi mu buryo bwa rusange ni:

options: Gusa iburyo bwo hagati y'inzira nyabagendwa
Muruhande urwarirwo rwo hagati mu nzira nyabagendwa
question: Mbere yuko umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga akata ibumoso mu nzira nyabagendwa, nihe  ikinyabiziga kigomba kuba kiri ?
Ibyapa byerekana icyago kidahoraho kandi bigenewe kwerekana aho bagana cyangwa  aho berekeza umuhanda nk'igihe cy'impanuka cyangwa hari imirimo ikorwa mu  muhanda birangwa n'amabara akurikira:

options: itara ry'urumuri rwera cyangwa rusa n'icunga rihishije imbere y'umukumbi
itara ry'urumuri rutukura cyangwaumuhondo ritwawe inyuma y'umukumbi
A na B ni ibisubizo by'ukuri
question: Iyo umukumbi ugizwe n'amatungo maremare arenze ane cyangwa amatungo magufi  arenze atandatu mu nzira nyabagendwa iyo hatakibona neza kuburyo umuyobozi  abona muri m 200 ugomba kugaragazwa kuburyo bukurikira:
Mu nsisiro umuvuduko ntarengwa w'ibinyabiziga bitwarira abantu hamwe ungana ute?

options: nijoro igihe ijuru rikeye nibura muri m 200
ku manywa igihe cy'umucyo nibura muri m50
nijoro nibura muri m 100 igihe ijuru rikeye
question: Itara ryo guhagarara ry'ibara ritukura rigomba kuba ridahumisha, kandi rigomba  kugaragarira mu ntera ikurikira:

options: Ibinyabiziga byavanywe mu muhanga n'abacuruzi babyo
question: Inyuguti RL ziri hejuru y'imibare 4 kuva kuri 0001 kugeza 9999 Ariko Inyuguti RL  zishobora gukurikirwa n'iriya mibare ine iyo umwanya wateganyirijwe icyapa inyuma  uhagije bityo icyapa cy'inyuma kikagira ingero zimwe n'icy'imbere, ni ku byapa  by'ibinyabiziga bikurikira
